member.name: T:ISerializer
member.summary: Implementations of this interface are able to serialize and deserialize an object graph from a stream.

member.name: M:ISerializer.Deserialize``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes an object graph from the given stream.

member.name: M:ISerializer.Serialize``1(System.IO.Stream,``0)
member.summary: Serializes the provided object graph and writes it to the storage.
member.param: The stream to serialize the graph into.
The object graph to be serialized.
